shortname.name: Used acronym or shorthand as team name
shortname.feedback: Use full team name in title

longpurpose.name: Purpose is too broad or long
longpurpose.feedback: Be as brief as possible when describing purpose of document

sectionnumbering.name: Numbering of sections is wrong
sectionnumbering.feedback: Pay attention to correct numbering of sections

referencegraphic.name: Referenced graphic in primary text
referencegraphic.feedback: Do not reference graphics in primary text

titlewithintitle.name: Used titles within title section
titlewithintitle.feedback: Do not use titles within title sections

stepsnotes.name: Formatting of steps and notes is wrong
stepsnotes.feedback: Steps translate to numbers, notes to bullets

wrongquotes.name: Used quotes when not quoting from source
wrongquotes.feedback: Only use quotes when referencing source material

allcaps.name: Used all caps when not quoting from source
allcaps.feedback: Do not use all caps case, unless directly quoting from source material

bullets.name: Used bullet points in primary text
bullets.feedback: Do not use bullet points in primary text

acronym.name: Used acronym without previously defining it
acronym.feedback: Do not use acronyms unless defined previously in the document

documenttype.name: Used wrong document type for section
documenttype.feedback: Use correct document type for each section
